title: May 2025 Releases

title: March 2025 Releases
description: conda 25.3.1, conda-build 25.3.2, conda-libmamba-solver 25.3.0, conda-index 0.6.0, and constructor 3.11.3 have been released! 🎉

title: November 2024 Releases

title: Navigating Change in Conda-Build Recipe Formats: Balancing Legacy and Innovation
description: The recent approval of the new recipe format (`recipe.yaml`, v1) does not mean the end of the old format (`meta.yaml`, v0). The conda community must balance innovation with support for legacy systems.
